attributes.action: The first weekend after social distancing is lifted made a bank holiday weekend
attributes.additional_details: The people of England have been in national lockdown since Christmas, we have come together as a nation to help the NHS and each other. It would be a celebration of our efforts and an annual reminder of the tough times being behind us.
attributes.background: Turn the first weekend after social distancing measures are scrapped into a bank holiday weekend

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020
